byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

abstract: Chegg will shift its management of physical books that it rents to students to Ingram Content Group by end of 2016; firm is rechanneling capital to fend off rivals.
lead_paragraph: The company will hand off the management of physical books that it rents to students to the Ingram Content Group.

headline.main: Chegg Is Shifting Its Services to Focus on Digital Push
headline.print_headline: Chegg Is Shifting Its Services to Focus on Digital Push

snippet: The company will hand off the management of physical books that it rents to students to the Ingram Content Group.
